title: The Stolen Moments Trilogy Box Set: Carter & Emilia's Love Story
description: The Stolen Moments trilogy follows Emilia and Carter's epic love story through high school, college and adulthood. "It is the type of story that clutches you at once and does not release you until the end - then you find yourself pining over the fact that the book has ended."What if the one person you can't have, is the one person you can't resist? Emilia and Carter have been enemies for as long as they can remember. Neither one of them can even remember how their feud started, but that has never stopped them from pulling some truly ridiculous pranks on each other. As their pranks escalate, so does the chemistry between them. They know they can never cross that line, though... After all, Emilia is Carter's little sister's best friend.3 books2 Rivals1 epic love storyThis Box Set includes all three novels of the Stolen Moments Trilogy: Stolen Moments, Illicit Promises, and The Ruins Of Us. This trilogy was previously named Mayhem.
author: Catharina Maura
